summary: The Discriminatory Gaming Tax Repeal Act of 2025 (H.R. 1440) aims to eliminate excise taxes on wagering. The bill, introduced in the House of Representatives on February 18, 2025, proposes to repeal Chapter 35 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, which pertains to taxes on wagering.  The repeal would apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2024.
